You can choose the default language when installing GUIDE@HAND to your mobile.EXPLORE WITH OFFLINE MAPYou can also discover the cityâs points of interest on your own, using the âExploreâ tab and our offline city map. You can then choose to listen to additional, related stories.TOURIST SERVICES YOU CAN SEARCH AND DISPLAY ON YOUR MAPGUIDE@HAND also helps you choose from a range of handy tourist services near you such as restaurants, bars, shops etc. which you can display on your map.What to gain by getting GUIDE@HAND?INSTALL:By installing GUIDE@HAND, you already have access to our offline city map.
